name: Zishoku
description:
Help Zishaku-kun retrieve his body!

 This game is 2D puzzle game where you use magnets to push and pull Zishaku's parts around. Please enjoy!

Made for the Global Game Jam 2022 with the theme of "duality".

Fluff - Game Designer

Stephen - Programmer

Philippe- Programmer

Tomomi - UI Designer

Vicky - Illustrator
